Welcome to Muse

You’ll receive a verification email shortly. After verification, you’ll get access to all of Muse’s features. If you don’t get the email in a few minutes, check your spam folder.

Invite your friends to join Muse by sharing this invite link:

https://musesessions.co/join

Download the free Muse app for Mac or Windows

Muse isn't currently available on mobile. To download the desktop app, visit the download page on a computer.

Mac OS X 10.13.6 or higher

Download for Mac

For Macs with Apple Silicon (M1, M2) chips, download here

Windows download

Windows 10 or higher

Muse Version 01.01.01 (Alpha)

We highly recommend that you watch our tutorials.
For additional help, you can view our FAQ, or you can contact us.

Your Feedback is Important to us.

We’re currently in Beta, so you may encounter minor bugs while using Muse. If you have any questions, bug reports, or suggestions for improvements, please let us know on the contact form here.
